ingredients.item: 350g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken Mini Breast Fillets
½ x 25g pack fresh chives, chopped

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Mix the Worcestershire sauce, honey, chilli sauce, garlic, paprika and celery salt together in a bowl and add the chicken. Mix to coat evenly and marinate for 10 minutes. Transfer to a small roasting tin and roast for 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked throughout with no pink meat.

Brush the corn with a little oil and griddle for 10 minutes until slightly charred. Cut off the kernels with a sharp knife and mix with the chives, salad onions and dressing. Serve the chicken with the sauce poured over.
